label.description: *Required*. Button's text that will be shown

isDisabled.description: Makes the button unable to be clicked

color.description: Sets a color based con Bulma's color options

size.description: Sets a size based on Bulma's size options

isOutlined.description: Exchange button's main color in the one on its text and border

isInverted.description: Exchange button's main color in the one on its text and border

isLoading.description: Changes button's text with a spinner animation

onClick.description: Sends a click signal to its parent component when user clicks on the button
